# NSWritingDirection.rightToLeft

**Case**

The writing direction is right to left.

## Declaration

```swift
case rightToLeft
```

## Constants

- **NSWritingDirection.natural**: The writing direction of the current script that the system determines using the Unicode Bidi Algorithm rules P2 and P3.
- **NSWritingDirection.leftToRight**: The writing direction is left to right.
